text:
Problem Description: Windows 98 only

String index out of range exception. The following messages were generated and 
are shown below.

Please let me know if you want me to send the build.xml file. The first 6 lines 
of the file are:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!-- This is a technique used to include define a file to include -->
<!DOCTYPE project [
  <!ENTITY IncludeBuildEnv SYSTEM "\..\..\..\..\..\..\buildEnv.xml">
  %IncludeBuildEnv;
]>  

Thank you in advance. – Kit Crumpton

BUILD FAILED
